name: Dollar Shave Club
description: The company, backed by technology studio Science, Inc. http://science-inc.com/, delivers razors equipped with stainless steel blades, lubrication strips and a pivoting head. At launch, members will be able to choose from three signature razorsâ€”The Humble Twin: a standard two-blade razor ($1/month, plus s+h); The 4x: a four-blade razor perfect for men's or women's hair removal needs ($6/month, shipping included); The Executive: a state-of-the-art six-blade razor ($9/month, shipping included)
